direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting a jsoup element to a W3C Document with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle document conversion and serialization, though with different outputs.
Both methods interact with W3C Documents, though for different purposes (conversion vs. XPath evaluation).
Both methods handle null parameters and throw exceptions in a similar manner.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a DocumentBuilder for creating W3C Documents.
Setting up namespace awareness is required before converting jsoup elements to W3C Documents.
Both methods verify the structure of the document and handle exceptions similarly.
